AboutView.title: Project information
AboutView.info_text: For the moment, this website is my web CV. If the need be, I'll be expanding it :)

technologies_text.description: The Composition API in Vue 3.0 is a new way to define components in Vue applications, introducing a more flexible and modular approach compared to the traditional options API. It allows for easier state management, logic handling, and code reuse across components.

Vuetify is a popular UI component library based on Vue.js that provides a wide range of pre-built components adhering to Material Design principles. It enables quick development of modern and responsive user interfaces.

Vue Router is the official routing library for Vue.js, allowing developers to create multi-page applications by managing routes and components within the application. It supports dynamic page loading, URL parameters, and more.

bullet_points:
Designed and implemented web application using Vue.js to visualize industrial robot animations. The
application featured a playback interface, allowing users to view data for a specific time period and
observe the corresponding robot motion animations. I implemented seamless integration of time-based
data visualization with precise robot movement simulation, providing an intuitive and interactive
experience for monitoring and analyzing robotic operations.

Designed and enhanced existing web solutions by creating new and modifying existing Django REST API
endpoints connected to a MySQL database. These endpoints facilitated the management and retrieval of a
detailed record of production exchanges, ensuring efficient data handling and integration with the existing
system.

Collaborated within a team of 3 engineers to design software solutions, utilizing Git for version control
and project coordination.

Designed and developed a web application with Vue.js for visualizing 3D models and animations, adhering
to UX/UI guidelines to ensure a user-friendly and engaging interface.

Collaborated within a team of 5 engineers using Git and Jira for version control, task management, and
project coordination.

Enhanced and optimized methods in Django REST API, improving backend performance and system
reliability.

Analyzed robot data to evaluate the system’s information transmission speed and ensure the proper
functionality of the robots, contributing to system efficiency and robustness.
[Fundamentals of Computer Science]: Fundamentals of programming and databases, C++, Winforms and MySQL
[Structured and object-oriented programming]: Object oriented programming, algorithms, data structures using C++
[Numerical Methods and Simulation]: Numerical methods and simulations with C++ and Matlab
[Modeling and control of Robots]: Fundamentals of ROS libraries and robotics simulation using Linux, Python
[Introduction to computer vision]: Image processing, industrial computer vision systems and basics of deep-learning
[Mobile Applications]: Creating accessible application using Android Studio, Kotlin
[Real Time Systems]: Multi-thread embedded applications using FreeRTOS, arduino. Multithreading in C++
Other courses: Haven't had the time to finish them yet.
